content.text:
# List of wars involving Sudan

This is a list of wars involving the Republic of Sudan and its predecessors.
Mahdist Sudan (1885–1899)

*  Colony of Eritrea
*
* }}
|style="background:#FFD0D0"| Defeat
* Sudanese invasions of neighbours repelled
* Britain and Egypt took over Sudan and turned it into a condominium known as the Anglo-Egyptian Sudan
* Kassala temporarily occupied by Italy
*Congo secures the Lado Enclave until 1910
|}

al-Qaeda  according to the South Sudanese, however, at least one unit of Iraqi paratroopers fought alongside the SAF near Juba. About 200 Iraqi soldiers were allegedly killed, and the site of their remains became known as "Jebel Iraqi". The International Institute for Strategic Studies also stated that Iraqi forces fought alongside Sudanese government troops. }} }}

|style="background:#E0D0FF"| Status quo ante bellum
* Disengagement and de-escalation
* Sudan recaptures all of the border territory with Ethiopia.
* Sudan and Ethiopia agree to settle all disputes peacefully.

** Rapid Support Forces

Tamazuj (from August 2023) Libyan National ArmyDesert WolvesSupported by: Wagner Group Chad (alleged)
----
SLM (al-Nur) SPLM-N (al-Hilu) (June 2023 – February 2025)
|style="background:#E0D0FF"|Ongoing
* Rapid Support Forces occupy most of Darfur, and parts of Kordofan.
* SPLM-N (al-Hilu) occupies parts of South Kordofan.
* SLM (al-Nur) control parts of Darfur
* Sudanese Armed Forces retake the Khartoum area by 20 May 2025.
|}

* Poggo, Scopas Sekwat. 1999. War and Conflict in Southern Sudan, 1955–1972. PhD Dissertation, University of California, Santa Barbara.
